verbs.description: [ARG0: rural life] [V: carries] [ARG1: 2 647 cost for cable where they live] makes it nearly essential that they have broadband internet service at home and it also makes it just about impossible for them to get it without home internet service the family also can not conduct routine business online and maintain connections with friends and family in a way that has become second nature to many of us internet service via satellite is impractical for complex reasons that walkowicz who specialized in radio and electronic technology during his 20 years in the military understands but i do n't walkowicz who worked briefly for time warner installing and fixing cable equipment after retiring from the air force and before his current job disagreed with much of the information contained in the letter including the estimated costs walkowicz tried many times to contact the time warner employee whose name and number were on the letter but did not receive a response and he said town officials told him there was nothing they could do to help as they negotiated a new franchise agreement with time warner that still leaves large sections of ballston and other significantly rural towns without broadband internet access psc spokesman james denn said members of the commission technical staff will review wolkowicz concerns and he said the commission also can provide assistance to municipalities as they negotiate new or renewed franchise agreements according to holick time warner has some 400 000 customers in the ballston area but the company sometimes considers the cost of serving a single home or small group of homes to be prohibitive time warner internet access time warner cable ballston spa school district rural walkowicz state public service commission ballston spa new york ballston new york ballston spa
